wikipedia_page.main: Fred Perry (2 January 1904 – 11 January 1981) was a British boxer. He competed in the men's featherweight event at the 1928 Summer Olympics.

response: Fred Perry (1909–1995) was a British tennis player and originator of the clothing line.
Fred Perry may also refer to:
* Fred Perry (Canadian football) (born 1975), American player of Canadian football

Miklós Gelbai (born 23 December 1909, date of death unknown) was a Hungarian boxer. He competed in the men's featherweight event at the 1928 Summer Olympics. At the 1928 Summer Olympics, he lost to Fred Perry of Great Britain.
